file_content.text: This is Director Antayen speaking. As you know, worker safety is one of Czerka's top priorities, and we take accidents seriously.
Therefore, due to concerns surrounding studies of the device, we are implementing a new policy.
Anyone wishing to perform a physical inspection of the device must get written authorization from myself and Doctor Di-go.
Research using droids and remote scanners may continue normally. Please note that this does not affect our division's overall schedule.
